t: AMAZON ONE ROLLS OUT AT NYU LANGONE HEALTH FACILITIES TO IMPROVE CHECK-IN FOR MILLIONS OF PATIENTS
s: March 3, 2025 - Amazon One is designed to deliver the highest levels of customer privacy and data security. NYU Langone is rolling out Amazon One in a move to optimize patients’ experiences while maintaining the highest standards of privacy and security.

t: AMAZON TO BRING PALM-SCANNING TECH TO NYU LANGONE HEALTH FACILITIES
s: March 3, 2025 - The collaboration has been about nine months in the making, said Nader Mherabi, NYU Langone's chief digital and information officer. Amazon said it plans to explore additional applications for Amazon One within health care in the future, such as credentialing for access to high-security areas ...

t: NYU LANGONE INTRODUCES AMAZON PALM-SCANNING TECH TO HOSPITALS - WASHINGTON SQUARE NEWS
s: March 20, 2025 - NYU Langone Health has partnered with Amazon to install new palm-scanning sensors in its New York City hospitals that patients can use to identify themselves before appointments with heightened efficiency and security. It is the first health care institution to adopt the technology, called ...

t: AWS BRINGS AMAZON ONE TO HEALTHCARE, REDUCING CHECK-IN FRICTION
s: March 5, 2025 - This shift mirrors Amazon’s retail approach. Just as Amazon Go stores removed checkout lines, NYU Langone is removing check-in delays, pleasing patients and allowing staff to focus more on patient care rather than administrative tasks.
